Name: Foaming Cleansers
Description: Lightweight cleansers that create a foam to remove impurities without stripping the skin.

Name: Gel Cleansers
Description: Gel-based facial cleansers ideal for oily and combination skin.

Name: Day Creams
Description: Moisturizers designed for daytime use with added SPF.

Name: Night Creams
Description: Rich moisturizers formulated to repair and hydrate the skin overnight.

Name: Hydrating Serums
Description: Serums that help boost moisture levels and plump the skin.

Name: Anti-Aging Serums
Description: Serums designed to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Name: Mineral Sunscreens
Description: Sunscreens that use mineral-based ingredients like zinc oxide to protect the skin from UV rays.

Name: Chemical Sunscreens
Description: Sunscreens formulated with chemical filters to absorb UV radiation.

Name: Physical Exfoliators
Description: Exfoliators that use physical particles like scrubs to slough off dead skin cells.

Name: Chemical Exfoliators
Description: Exfoliators that use acids like AHAs and BHAs to dissolve dead skin cells without scrubbing.

Name: Anti-Puffiness Eye Creams
Description: Eye creams that target puffiness and reduce under-eye swelling.

Name: Dark Circle Correcting Eye Creams
Description: Eye creams formulated to brighten and reduce the appearance of dark circles.
